sources.title: Bird Symphony (1955)
sources.description: This CinemaScope Terrytoon presents a symphony orchestra, composed entirely of birds, giving a performance in a woodland grove. The musical instruments are natural props, such as flower-horns, twig violins and harps composed of heron's legs. The conductor is a woodpecker. A couple of cats are on the prowl and try to capture the birds through the use of various disguises. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bird-symphony-1955/
